column3: What would you like to know?
What kind of place is this?
Oh, I like housing─that is to say, I <Emphasis>like</Emphasis> it. I roam this fair land─fairest!─touring all the adventurer settlements. You might say I'm a flatspotter. Or a house peeper.
Oh, one of us, are you? A fellow house peeper, very <Emphasis>good</Emphasis>! You must talk to the resident caretakers then. Connections are everything in this...proclivity.

That cove right there is where Rycharde Mistbeard came home to his hideout. Mmm, lore! And brine! This is Mist, <Emphasis>the</Emphasis> residential area for adventurers─and a fine piece of Limsa it is too.
Ah, the Goblet! Now who doesn't want to drink from <Emphasis>this</Emphasis>, I ask. I was planning a trip to Ul'dah just to see this place, but plans kept getting pushed back. But finally, I'm here!

Now, this one might be my favorite residential area right now. The Lavender Beds! Such a relaxing area, don't you think? I've had a rather stressful few years, to be honest. The quiet life in Gridania, among the trees... <sigh>
Lest you wonder, Shirogane means platinum, and small wonder this place is named so. That pristine, glittering sand is a treat for eyes and feet alike. Truly a slice of Far Eastern paradise, this!

I had heard the people of Ishgard sought assistance to rebuild in the wake of the Dragonsong War, but never did I expect they would accomplish all this, and so quickly! Indeed, it is the epitome of masonry.
I say, is this your chocobo by any chance? He <Emphasis>is</Emphasis>? Wonderful, wonderful!

The fellow wandered here a while ago, looking rather glum for having been separated from his <If(PlayerParameter(4))>mistress<Else/>master</If>. I'm glad that you came by when you did─nothing warms the heart like a happy reunion!
Your chocobo companion has been returned to you, and may once again be summoned to your side.
